column3: ej,bellb001,M,phild901,Balls and strikes $Tigers manager Bell ejected by HP umpire Phillips at end of visitors 9th for arguing balls and strikes
ej,adair801,C,phild901,Call at 1B $Tigers coach Adair ejected by HP umpire Phillips for arguing that Hunter was safe at 1st
ej,howea001,M,joycj901,Balls and strikes ej,mcgwm001,P,joycj901,Balls and strikes Mark McGwire and Athletics manager Art Howe ejected by HP umpire Jim Joyce
ej,brocd001,P,culbf901,Intentional HBP Doug Brocail ejected by HP umpire Fieldin Culbreth

ej,bellb001,M,mcclt901,Stalling for pitcher to warm up ej,casar001,P,mcclt901,Stalling for pitcher to warm up Raul Casanova and Tigers manager Buddy Bell ejected by HP umpire Tim McClelland for stalling in order to allow a pitcher to warm up
ej,carer001,C,everm901,Balls and strikes Angels coach Rod Carew ejected by HP umpire Mike Everitt sometime in game
ej,frymt001,P,everm901,Called third strike Travis Fryman ejected by HP umpire Mike Everitt
ej,salmt001,P,everm901,Balls and strikes Tim Salmon ejected by HP umpire Mike Everitt; Angels coach Larry Bowa tried to hold Salmon, who broke free and went chest-to-chest with Everitt
ej,bellb001,M,everm901,Balls and strikes Tigers manager Buddy Bell ejected by HP umpire Mike Everitt sometime in the 15th inning

$the Tigers were upset with Mike Everitt's strike zone; Phil Nevin, who was on deck at the end of the game, tossed his helmet after the last pitch; as the umpires entered the Tigers dugout walking to their dressing room, Nevin tossed a batting glove towards Everitt
